attributes.action: Free prescriptions for people with Inflammatory Bowel Disease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IBD is a life long disease and medication is a necessity to keep the disease under control. Having to pay for the prescriptions is an extra cost that should not be necessary when we have no choice but to have the medication!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Free prescriptions for people with Inflammatory Bowel Disease."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16832

Prime Minister's Office
